en: Out of habit, she has set the table for two.
yr: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìṣe rẹ̀, ó ti to tábìlì fún èèyàn méjì.

en: The next morning, the couple decided to leave very early to visit another area.
yr: Láàárọ̀ ọjọ́ kejì, àwọn tọkọtaya náà pinnu láti tètè jí kúrò níbi tí wọ́n dé sí kí wọ́n lè lọ wàásù ní àgbègbè míì.

en: To my horror, I noticed that there was a photograph of someone in a military uniform in the hallway.
yr: Ẹ̀rù bà mí nígbà tí mo rí fọ́tò ẹnì kan tó wọ aṣọ ológun ní ọ̀dẹ̀dẹ̀ ilé náà.

en: I like to take a nap immediately after lunch everyday.
yr: Mo fẹ́ràn láti rẹjú ní wàrawàra lẹ̀yìn oúnjẹ ò̩sán lojojúmọ́.

en: A Secret You Can Tell Others.
yr: Àṣírí Kan Tó O Lè Sọ fún Ẹlòmíì.
